tests.name: DELIMITED in/out
statements: CREATE STREAM TEST (ID STRING KEY, time TIME) WITH (kafka_topic='test', value_format='DELIMITED');
CREATE STREAM TEST2 AS SELECT * FROM TEST;

tests.name: AVRO in/out
statements: CREATE STREAM TEST (ID STRING KEY, time TIME) WITH (kafka_topic='test', value_format='AVRO');
CREATE STREAM TEST2 AS SELECT * FROM TEST;

tests.name: JSON in/out
statements: CREATE STREAM TEST (ID STRING KEY, time TIME) WITH (kafka_topic='test', value_format='JSON');
CREATE STREAM TEST2 AS SELECT * FROM TEST;

tests.name: PROTOBUF in/out
statements: CREATE STREAM TEST (ID STRING KEY, time TIME) WITH (kafka_topic='test', value_format='PROTOBUF');
CREATE STREAM TEST2 AS SELECT * FROM TEST;

tests.name: casting - time to string
statements: CREATE STREAM TEST (ID STRING KEY, TIME TIME) WITH (kafka_topic='test', value_format='AVRO');
CREATE STREAM TEST2 AS SELECT ID, CAST(TIME AS STRING) AS RESULT FROM TEST;

tests.name: casting - string to time
statements: CREATE STREAM TEST (ID STRING KEY, TIME STRING) WITH (kafka_topic='test', value_format='AVRO');
CREATE STREAM TEST2 AS SELECT ID, CAST(TIME AS TIME) AS RESULT FROM TEST;

tests.name: casting - timestamp to time
statements: CREATE STREAM TEST (ID STRING KEY, TIME TIMESTAMP) WITH (kafka_topic='test', value_format='AVRO');
CREATE STREAM TEST2 AS SELECT ID, CAST(TIME AS TIME) AS RESULT FROM TEST;

tests.name: time in complex types
statements: CREATE STREAM TEST (ID STRING KEY, S STRUCT<TIME TIME>, A ARRAY<TIME>, M MAP<STRING, TIME>) WITH (kafka_topic='test', value_format='AVRO');
CREATE STREAM TEST2 AS SELECT ID, S -> TIME AS S, A[1] AS A, M['TIME'] AS M FROM TEST;

tests.name: equal - time time
statements: CREATE STREAM TEST (ID STRING KEY, a TIME, b TIME) WITH (kafka_topic='test', value_format='AVRO');
CREATE STREAM TEST2 AS SELECT ID, (a = b) AS RESULT FROM TEST;

tests.name: not equal - time time
statements: CREATE STREAM TEST (ID STRING KEY, a TIME, b TIME) WITH (kafka_topic='test', value_format='AVRO');
CREATE STREAM TEST2 AS SELECT ID, (a <> b) AS RESULT FROM TEST;

tests.name: is distinct - time time
statements: CREATE STREAM TEST (ID STRING KEY, a TIME, b TIME) WITH (kafka_topic='test', value_format='AVRO');
CREATE STREAM TEST2 AS SELECT ID, (a IS DISTINCT FROM b) AS RESULT FROM TEST;

tests.name: less than - time time
statements: CREATE STREAM TEST (ID STRING KEY, a TIME, b TIME) WITH (kafka_topic='test', value_format='AVRO');
CREATE STREAM TEST2 AS SELECT ID, (a < b) AS RESULT FROM TEST;

tests.name: LEQ - time time
statements: CREATE STREAM TEST (ID STRING KEY, a TIME, b TIME) WITH (kafka_topic='test', value_format='AVRO');
CREATE STREAM TEST2 AS SELECT ID, (a <= b) AS RESULT FROM TEST;

tests.name: GEQ - time time
statements: CREATE STREAM TEST (ID STRING KEY, a TIME, b TIME) WITH (kafka_topic='test', value_format='AVRO');
CREATE STREAM TEST2 AS SELECT ID, (a >= b) AS RESULT FROM TEST;

tests.name: greater than - time time
statements: CREATE STREAM TEST (ID STRING KEY, a TIME, b TIME) WITH (kafka_topic='test', value_format='AVRO');
CREATE STREAM TEST2 AS SELECT ID, (a > b) AS RESULT FROM TEST;

tests.name: greater than - time string
statements: CREATE STREAM TEST (ID STRING KEY, a time) WITH (kafka_topic='test', value_format='AVRO');
CREATE STREAM TEST2 AS SELECT ID, (a > '00:00:00.010') AS RESULT FROM TEST;

tests.name: filter
statements: CREATE STREAM TEST (ID STRING KEY, TIME TIME) WITH (kafka_topic='test', value_format='AVRO');
CREATE STREAM TEST2 AS SELECT * FROM TEST WHERE TIME='00:00:00.010';

tests.name: between
statements: CREATE STREAM TEST (ID STRING KEY, TIME TIME) WITH (kafka_topic='test', value_format='AVRO');
CREATE STREAM TEST2 AS SELECT * FROM TEST WHERE TIME BETWEEN '00:00:00.005' AND '00:00:00.010';
